pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Sets for Copula Additive Distributional Regression Using R // Data sets used in the book Marra and Radice (2025, ISBN:9781032973111) "Copula Additive Distributional Regression Using R", for illustrating the fitting of various joint (and univariate) regression models, with several types of covariate effects, in the presence of equations' errors association.
